pr_title: Issue #7759: Regexp & RegexpSinglelineJava check does not support SuppressionXpathFilter.

timeline.body:

  • * RegexpSinglelineJava *
    • *
  • ``` to: ``` * Regexp (reason is at #7759) *
    • *
  • * RegexpSinglelineJava (reason is at #7759) *
    • *
  • ``` the same for `config_filters.xml`.
